description.en: This dataset provides a headline summary of key voting statistics for GE13 at parliament level, including voter turnout, margin of victory, and rejected votes. GE13 was held on 5th May 2013.
description.bm: Dataset ini merumuskan statistik undi penting bagi PRU13 di peringkat parlimen, termasuk peratus keluar, margin kemenangan, dan undi tolak. PRU13 dilaksanakan pada 5 Mei 2013.

variables.name: state
variables.desc_en: [Categorical] Name of the state (16 in total) or Malaysia

variables.name: undi_keluar_peti
variables.desc_en: [Integer] The number of ballots officially released.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] The number of ballots officially released.

variables.name: undi_dalam_peti
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Number of ballots returned for counting.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Number of ballots returned for counting.

variables.name: undi_tak_kembali
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Number of ballots not returned after being released, including postal ballots that were not returned to the polling station by the time of counting.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Number of ballots not returned after being released, including postal ballots that were not returned to the polling station by the time of counting.

variables.name: undi_tolak
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Number of ballots returned but rejected during the counting process.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Number of ballots returned but rejected during the counting process.

variables.name: majoriti
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Difference between the number of votes won by the victorious candidate, and their closest competitor.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Difference between the number of votes won by the victorious candidate, and their closest competitor.

variables.name: peratus_keluar
variables.desc_en: [Float] Proportion of registered voters who voted.
variables.desc_bm: [Float] Proportion of registered voters who voted.

variables.name: pengundi_jumlah
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Number of individuals eligible to vote.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Number of individuals eligible to vote.

variables.name: pengundi_tidak_hadir
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Number of eligible voters who did not vote.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Number of eligible voters who did not vote.

variables.name: peratus_tolak
variables.title_en: GE13: Rejected Votes (% of Total Votes)
variables.title_bm: PRU13: Undi Tolak (% daripada Jumlah Undi)
variables.desc_en: [Float] Proportion of returned vallots rejected during the counting process.
variables.desc_bm: [Float] Proportion of returned vallots rejected during the counting process.

variables.name: nisbah_tolak_majoriti
variables.desc_en: [Float] Ratio of rejected votes to the winning margin. A value more than 100 indicates that the number of rejected votes exceeded the margin of victory.
variables.desc_bm: [Float] Ratio of rejected votes to the winning margin. A value more than 100 indicates that the number of rejected votes exceeded the margin of victory.

variables.name: nisbah_tidakhadir_majoriti
variables.title_bm: PRU13: Jumlah Tidak Mengundi (% daripada Majoriti)
variables.desc_en: [Float] Ratio of non-voters to the winning margin. A value more than 100 indicates that the number of eligible voters who did not vote exceeded the margin of victory.
variables.desc_bm: [Float] Ratio of non-voters to the winning margin. A value more than 100 indicates that the number of eligible voters who did not vote exceeded the margin of victory.

en.methodology: This data is produced by SPR, and details the official results as gazetted by SPR.
en.caveat: In the event of a conflict between this data and any other source, the SPR portal and election dashboard should be regarded as the single source of truth.

bm.methodology: Data ini dihasilkan oleh Suruhanjaya Pilihanraya, dan memberi perincian keputusan pilihanraya seperti yang diwartakan oleh SPR.
bm.caveat: Sekiranya terdapat perbezaan antara data ini dengan mana-mana sumber lain, perlu diingati bahawa data yang absah adalah data yang dipaparkan di portal ataupun papan pemuka SPR.
